name: Summoners Defense
description:
The game is in early Pre-Alpha!

Iif you like the direction its going you can join the discord on https://discord.gg/abjrfvDjNk to give feedback.

What will the game be like?

  • Free to play
  • Play against up multiple AI opponents in solo play(Done)
  • Play online against others players(Done/Development)
  • Create your own map and levels(Done/Development)
  • Over 20 units already and more to come
  • Items, Unit-Classes, SpellCards, Buildings, Ressources (Planned)
  • Trading-, Quest-, Achievement-, Economy-, Crafting-, Sciene-System (Planned)
  • Achievements, Tournament modes(Planned)
  • Social system(including guilds and guild-battles etc)(Planned)
  • Different types of AI (Planned)
  • Crossplatform multiplayer PC, Android and more(Done/Planned)
  • Singleplayer campaign(Planned)
  • Increasingly more complexity by adding a variety of mods, maps, levels, units and much more
  • Strategy based with focus on meaningful decision making
